label: Commodity Trading
description: Trading of physical or virtual goods that are interchangeable with other goods of the same type.

subcategories.label: Oil Trading
subcategories.description: Trading of crude oil, refined petroleum products, and other related products.

subcategories.label: Agricultural Commodity Trading
subcategories.description: Trading of agricultural products such as grains, livestock, and dairy products.

subcategories.label: Metal Trading
subcategories.description: Trading of precious and base metals such as gold, silver, copper, and aluminum.

subcategories.label: Energy Trading
subcategories.description: Trading of energy products such as natural gas, electricity, and coal.

subcategories.label: Currency Trading
subcategories.description: Trading of currencies in the foreign exchange market.
